objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Comedy themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Comedy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Comedy lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a humorous misunderstanding or funny situation involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a comedy context
Students engage in comedy themed role-play about food and dining out using neutral register
Students create original comedy themed content about food and dining out in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Comedy scenario?
What hilarious or amusing might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Comedy story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Comedy perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this comedy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Comedy situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in comedy context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within comedy theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with hilarious
food and dining out with amusing
food and dining out with ridiculous

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Comedy theme: Humor, wit, funny situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Comedy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
